title: WTB - T206 EPDG John Hummel - offering $1,100 and up for card with numerical grade

posts.post_title: WTB - T206 EPDG John Hummel - offering $1,100 and up for card with numerical grade
posts.post_content: WTB — T206 EPDG John Hummel, paying $1,000 and up for a copy in a PSA or SGC holder with a numerical grade. Will also consider raw copies or slabbed cards graded "authentic."   p/p f/f   Message me or email: jonathanweil53 // at // gmail // dot // com
